sentences.en: ...a maverick group of scientists, who oppose the prevailing medical opinion on the disease.
sentences.cn: …一群特立独行的科学家，他们反对关于这种疾病的医学界的盛行观点。

sentences.en: And beneath their maverick exteriors, such outfits are reassuringly obsessed with cost control.
sentences.cn: 吉姆?斯特恩(JimStern)曾做过基金经理,后来筹够钱就开始拍摄电影.

sentences.en: As a control, though, the maverick was sometimes programmed to behave in an unusually generous way.
sentences.cn: 不过, 作为调节, 有时这位特立独行的玩家的编程表现出不同寻常的慷慨.

sentences.en: But there are many people struggling with life, not to change maverick mettle and frankness.
sentences.cn: 但也有不少人一生挣扎, 仍不改特立独行的秉性与率真.

sentences.en: Erin seems to be much more the hair maverick.
sentences.cn: 埃琳在发式上似乎要标新立异得多.

sentences.en: He was too much of a maverick ever to hold high office.
sentences.cn: 他太特立独行，永远不可能做高官。

sentences.en: He's a maverick. He has his own way of thinking about things.
sentences.cn: 他是个特异独行的人. 对事情有自己的看法.

sentences.en: He’s always been a bit of a maverick.
Her independence and maverick behaviour precluded any chance of promotion.
sentences.cn: 她的独立精神和自行其是断送了一切升迁的机会。

sentences.en: In 1975 Tommy was adapted as a film, directed by maverick British auteur Ken Russell.
sentences.cn: 1975年,《汤米》被改编成电影, 由特立独行的英国电影导演肯·拉塞尔执导.

sentences.en: MaVerick DBMS an open source Multi - Value DBMS.
sentences.cn: 这是个 开源 数据库管理系统.

sentences.en: Maverick, unlawful human action rules the markets, unexpected and unimaginable monstrous events shape the markets.
sentences.cn: 标新立异、不合法规的人类行为支配着市场, 出乎意料且难以想象的骇人事件则塑造了市场.

sentences.en: Politically, she's a bit of a maverick.
sentences.cn: 在政治方面, 她有点自行其是.

sentences.en: Power , strength of character, confidence a maverick nature and an immensely interesting personality.
sentences.cn: 有力量,个性, 自信,出生牛犊不怕死的性格和十分有趣的人格.

sentences.en: Some maverick scientists believe that both gravity and light are electromagnetic forces.
sentences.cn: 某些独立研究科学家们认为,重力和光都是电磁力.

sentences.en: The change of heart is quintessential Buffett - rational, decisive, maverick and blazing a path all his own.
sentences.cn: 改变主意是巴菲特的精髓 ---- 理性 、 果断、与众不同 、 独辟蹊径.

sentences.en: You're a maverick and you'll try anything.
sentences.cn: 你是个爱自行其是的人,样样事情都要尝试一下.

trans.tran_cn: 未打烙印的；行为不合常规的；特立独行的
未烙印的小动物，标新立异的人，持不同意见的人
